TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogPolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the policy associated with a .

span.span: Represents the policy associated with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 策略是一组规则， 实例及其客户端需要遵守这些规则。A policy is a set of rules to be followed by a instance and its clients. 实例用于检查和修改与特定 相关联的策略。A instance is used to examine and modify the policy associated with a specific . 策略可描述允许的最小和最大日志大小，或者 实例的允许增长方式。A policy can describe the minimum and maximum allowable log sizes, or how the instance is allowed to grow. 此外，还可以控制是否能够存档 实例。In addition, you can also control whether a instance can be archived. 更改任何属性之后，都应使用 方法，以确保将更改应用于 。After changing any of the properties, you should use the method to ensure that the changes are applied to the . 调用 方法可以放弃更改，或获得最新策略。You can call the method to discard changes or to get the most current policy. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。This example shows how to use the class to set policy for a log record sequence. [!code-csharp[S_UELogRecordSequence#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelogrecordsequence/cs/mylogrecordsequence.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UELogRecordSequence#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelogrecordsequence/vb/mylogrecordsequence.vb#2)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the percentage of free space the can shrink.

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage of free space the can shrink.

value.span: 可收缩的可用空间百分比。

span.span: The percentage of free space the can shrink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的可用空间量大于此属性所指定的量时， 会自动减小其大小，直至达到 属性所指定的大小为止。When the amount of free space in the is greater than the amount specified by this property, the automatically reduces its size until it reaches the size specified by the property. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。This example shows how to use the class to set policy for a log record sequence. The rate of automatic growth of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 满时，此策略值确定可添加的空间量。When the becomes full, this policy value determines how much more space can be added. 如果该值使 中的范围数超过 ，则不会添加空间。Space will not be added if it causes the number of extents in the to exceed . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。This example shows how to use the class to set policy for a log record sequence. span.span: An integer that specifies the minimum number of instances the can contain.

value.span: CLFS 要求最小范围数为 2 个范围，因此，此值最小应为 2。

span.span: Since the CLFS requires that the minimum extent count to be 2 extents, this value should be at least 2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串可包含一个完整路径，指向创建新范围的目录。This string can contain a full path to the directory where the new extent is created. 范围的默认路径是包含基 文件的目录。The default path to the extent is the directory that contains the base file. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。This example shows how to use the class to set policy for a log record sequence. summary.span: Gets or sets the amount of space that the event requires for advancing the base of the log.

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space that the event requires for advancing the base of the log.

value.span: 事件前调日志基数所要求的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space that the event requires for advancing the base of the log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空间量可表示为百分比，也可表示为字节数，在 CLFS 中，字节数舍入到最接近的容器。The amount of space can be expressed in percentage, or in bytes which is rounded off to the nearest containers in CLFS. 默认值为 35%。The default is 35 percent. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。This example shows how to use the class to set policy for a log record sequence.
